name: Shadow Dragon Battle: Warrior
description:
This is special game in the world.
In this game, you will play to fight against enormous Dragon bosses, the most dangerous enemy in the universe. Through each level, your enemies will upgrade their power, which makes the game stay challenging and exciting.

*******FEATURES
- Easy and Simple to play
- Cool transform effect
- Cool skill design and effect
- Cool transform
- New character
- Ultra instinct
- Daily Gift
- Free All
